name: Dicey Warriors
description:
Turn based combat game where you can plan up to 6 moves, but choose wisely, as the moves you end up ultimately doing depend on a roll of a dice.

Our submission for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam!

Made by me and Intecial, with me doing lot of the art assets and Intecial doing lot of the coding

Intecial's itch.io: https://intecial.itch.io/
